Supreme Seer Eli:
I help relocate party channels that have the right to fight Andreas Van Hottler.
The Triolian Demon seeks to subjugate the minds of all it can. Remember this!
The number of participants in the Triolian Mirror Ritual is determined by the number of Triolian Revelations. Don't miss them - remember to look around! To avoid being caught off guard by Triolian warriors, remember: 1 Triolian Revelation marks 10 people. Be vigilant!
